item.title: 联合信贷银行计划转移与 85 亿欧元贷款相关的风险
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）正在进行三笔重大的风险转移交易，涉及多达 85 亿欧元（90 亿美元）的意大利和德国公司贷款。【原文：UniCredit SpA is working on three significant risk transfer deals linked to as much as €8.5 billion ($9 billion) of loans to Italian and German companies, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 麦吉尼斯称欧洲将把银行交易规则推迟一年
item.description: 欧盟将把全球银行资本规则的一个关键部分推迟一年，这样欧盟的贷款人就不会因为美国在标准问题上的持续争论而处于不利地位。【原文：The European Union will delay a key part of global bank capital rules by a year, so that the bloc’s lenders will not be disadvantaged by continued wrangling over the standards in the US.】

item.title: 中国 10 年期国债期货创收盘纪录
item.description: 中国的主权债券期货周二创下收盘纪录新高，因为尽管受到当局的严格审查，但国债购买狂潮仍在延续。【原文：China’s sovereign bond futures saw a record closing high Tuesday as the buying frenzy for government debt extended despite scrutiny from authorities.】

item.title: 美国银行称法国成为欧洲最不受欢迎的股票市场
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的一项调查显示，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）总统决定举行临时大选的影响使法国股市成为欧洲最不受欢迎的股市。【原文：The fallout from President Emmanuel Macron’s decision to call a snap election has made French stocks the least popular in Europe, according to a Bank of America Corp. survey.】

item.title: 马克龙投票呼声尘埃落定，欧洲股市反弹
item.description: 欧洲股市连续第二个交易日反弹，原因是投资者在法国大选前评估了该国的政治事态发展，并在近期大跌后在市场上寻找机会，尽管涨幅依然不大。【原文：European equities bounced back for a second session as investors took stock of political developments in France ahead of elections and scoured the market for opportunities following a recent selloff, even as gains remained muted.】

item.title: 汇丰银行在摩根大通纳入印度市场前看到 2.5 亿美元的印度掉期交易
item.description: 在印度主权债券被纳入一个重要的全球指数之前，汇丰控股公司上个月在印度的国际金融中心执行了近一半的债券衍生品交易量。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has executed nearly half the volume of bond-derivative trades in India’s international finance hub over the last month, ahead of the sovereign bonds’ inclusion in a key global index.】

item.title: 惠誉将瑞典 Intrum 公司的评级下调至 CCC，原因是该公司面临不良汇率风险
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将瑞典收债公司 Intrum AB 的信用评级下调至 CCC 级，原因是该公司即将进行的再融资被视为不良债务交换的可能性 "大幅增加"。【原文：Swedish debt collector Intrum AB saw its credit rating cut one step to CCC by Fitch Ratings given there is a “materially increased” possibility that the company’s looming refinancing could be viewed as a distressed debt exchange.】

item.title: Baker Europastry 在西班牙启动首次公开募股，助推欧洲复兴
item.description: 烘焙公司 Europastry SA 宣布了在西班牙证券交易所首次公开募股的计划，这是欧洲市场在经历了两年的低迷后重振旗鼓的最新举措。【原文：Bakery firm Europastry SA announced plans for an initial public offering on Spanish stock exchanges, the latest in a reviving European market after two years of muted activity.】

item.title: 勒庞党称需要绝对多数才能治理法国
item.description: 全国集会党领导人乔丹-巴尔德拉呼吁支持者让他的政党及其盟友在法国临时大选中大获全胜，使他能够执政，这为极右翼执掌决策权设立了很高的门槛。【原文：National Rally leader Jordan Bardella called on supporters to hand his party and its allies a resounding victory in France’s snap election to enable him to govern, setting a high bar for the far right to take the reins of policymaking.】

item.title: 汇丰聘请 MUFG 部门出售五年来首笔武士债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港上海汇丰银行有限公司已聘请三菱日联摩根士丹利证券公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Morgan Stanley Securities Co.【原文：Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corp. has hired Mitsubishi UFJ Morgan Stanley Securities Co. as a lead manager to sell its first Samurai bond in five years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 外资持有的中国债券在掉期顺风下创纪录
item.description: 上个月，全球投资者增持了创纪录的中国债券，这是因为市场出现异常，将美元兑换成人民币可以获得溢价。【原文：Global investors boosted their holdings of Chinese bonds to a record last month, taking advantage of a market anomaly that allows a premium when swapping dollars into the yuan.】

item.title: 干旱持续，中国警察局长强调粮食安全
item.description: 中国警方负责人誓言打击农业犯罪以保障粮食安全，这一不同寻常的举动凸显了中国领导层在下月召开的党的重要会议之前对稳定的重视。【原文：The head of China’s police has vowed to crack down on agricultural crimes to safeguard food security, in an unusual move that underscores the Chinese leadership’s focus on stability ahead of a key party conclave next month.】

item.title: 壳牌收购新加坡液化天然气贸易公司 Pavilion Energy
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）同意收购液化天然气贸易商 Pavilion Energy 私人有限公司（Pavilion Energy Pte），该交易将加强壳牌石油公司在液化天然气领域的业务。【原文：Shell Plc agreed to buy liquefied natural gas trader Pavilion Energy Pte, in a deal that will bolster the oil major’s operations in the sector.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市将结束三日连跌
韩国将在韩元交易时间延长前进行最后测试
item.description: 韩国将在下月正式开始延长韩元交易时间之前的最后一系列试验中模拟延长韩元交易时间。【原文：South Korea will simulate extended trading hours for the won during its final trial series before the official start of longer sessions next month.】

item.title: PBB 为 5 亿欧元房地产债务基金寻找投资者
item.description: 德国复兴信贷银行（Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG）正在为一个高达 5 亿欧元（5.35 亿美元）的房地产债务基金寻找投资者，因为这家德国房地产贷款机构希望实现业务模式的多元化。【原文：Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG is sounding out investors for a real estate debt fund of as much as €500 million ($535 million), as the German property lender aims to diversify its business model.】

item.title: 伯克希尔在比亚迪股价反弹之际放缓抛售步伐

item.title: 韩国央行研究称，对标签的热爱使韩国通胀更加坚挺
item.description: 韩国中央银行的一份研究报告称，韩国人对标签的热爱比其他发达国家更强烈地推动了当地的通货膨胀，使得货币政策更难控制生活成本。【原文：South Koreans’ love for labels is driving local inflation more strongly than in other developed nations, making it harder for monetary policy to rein in the costs of living, a central bank study said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚维持关键利率不变，将 "警惕 "通货膨胀
item.description: 澳大利亚央行将利率维持在 12 年来的高位，并强调通胀已被证明具有粘性，这表明决策者还需要一段时间才能发出宽松信号。【原文：Australia’s central bank kept interest rates at a 12-year high and highlighted that inflation is proving sticky, suggesting it will be some time before policymakers are ready to signal easing.】

item.title: 货物量激增，阿达尼港口的市场价值居全球同行之首
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的港口运营商在高货运量使其成为全球市值最大的运输运营和服务提供商后，其股票有望进一步上涨。【原文：Shares of billionaire Gautam Adani’s port operator are primed for further gains after high cargo volumes made it the world’s largest transport operations and services provider by market value.】

item.title: 需求低迷导致新加坡房屋销售连续第二个月下降
item.description: 新加坡的新屋销售连续第二个月下滑，原因是需求疲软和缺乏大型推盘活动继续拖累市场。【原文：Singapore’s new-home sales fell for a second month, as weak demand and a lack of major launches continued to weigh on the market.】

item.title: 陷入困境的电动汽车制造商菲斯科申请破产
item.description: 电动汽车初创企业菲斯科公司（Fisker Inc.【原文：Electric vehicle startup Fisker Inc. has filed for bankruptcy after discussions with a major automaker about an investment ended without a deal.】

item.title: 英国国家养老金投资者考虑入股泰晤士水务公司
item.description: 英国最大的养老基金之一表示，如果泰晤士河水务公司重组并出售，它可能会考虑投资该公司。【原文：One of the UK’s largest pension funds has said it may consider investing in Thames Water if the stricken utility is restructured and put up for sale.】

item.title: 匈牙利将以更小的削减幅度结束宽松周期
item.description: 匈牙利央行准备以最后一次降息结束长达一年多的货币宽松周期，在福林暴跌之后，央行可能会谨慎行事。【原文：Hungary’s central bank is poised to finish its more than yearlong monetary easing cycle with one last interest rate cut, which is likely to err on the side of caution after a plunge in the forint.】

item.title: 高盛认为美国就业处于拐点，坚持两次减薪呼吁
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The US labor market stands at an “inflection point” where any further softness in demand for workers will hit jobs, not just job openings, according to economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 泰国央行行长警告不要调整通胀目标
item.description: 泰国央行行长警告说，任何提高货币当局通胀目标的举动都可能使预期失去支撑，导致物价上涨加快，从而给经济增长带来风险。【原文：Thailand’s central bank governor warned that any move to raise the monetary authority’s inflation target may unanchor expectations and result in quickening price gains, which carries risks for economic growth.】

item.title: 欧洲动荡引发避险情绪，美元测试 2024 年高点
item.description: 随着美国国债收益率的上升，以及投资者为躲避欧洲政治不确定性而涌向世界储备货币，美元正在徘徊于 2024 年的新高。【原文：The dollar is flirting with a new 2024 high as elevated US Treasury yields and investors seeking shelter from political uncertainty in Europe flock to the world’s reserve currency.】

item.title: Blackstone 拟以 17 亿美元收购日本电子漫画公司 Infocom
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 已同意收购日本电子漫画提供商 Infocom Corp.【原文：Blackstone Inc. has agreed to buy Japanese e-comics provider Infocom Corp. in a deal valuing the company at about 275 billion yen ($1.7 billion), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
